full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement: Programming Services

The National Research Council (NRC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Level 3 BI Programmer/Analyst services to support the NRC Industrial Research Assistance Program (NRC IRAP) datawarehouse/business intelligence (DW/BI) projects.

**Contract Details:**

* **Contract Title:** A.7 Programmer/Analyst Level 3
* **Reference Number:** cb-5354-1770598
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-10
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-25T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Tender Information:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others.

**Contracting Entity:**
The National Research Council (NRC) will be the contracting entity for this project.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact:
Philippe G. Cléroux
Email: philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 998-1073

**Attachments:**
Two documents are attached to this notice:

* 23-58008---npp.pdf
* 23-58008---npp_final.pdf

Note: This is a more formal and concise version of the original text, removing unnecessary information and focusing on the essential details.
